item.title: About Palantir
item.description: üîç Interested in Palantir? Here‚Äôs a quick overview! Palantir Technologies, founded in 2003 and headquartered in Denver, offers software for data operations and AI infrastructure. Their solutions support organizations in various sectors, including defense, healthcare, and finance. Their platforms integrate diverse data sources to enhance decision-making, while ensuring customer data remains secure and controlled. Notably, Palantir does not act as a data collector or broker. For more insights,…

item.title: Scaling On-Prem Security at Palantir

item.title: America‚Äôs AI Action Plan
item.description: üöÄ On July 23, 2025, the White House released “Winning the AI Race: America‚Äôs AI Action Plan,” aiming to boost U.S. leadership in AI through 90+ federal policy actions. Key focuses include: - Promoting commercial AI solutions in federal procurement, especially for the DoD. - Streamlining processes for AI system approvals and leveraging existing platforms like Maven and Army Vantage. The plan emphasizes the role of testbeds for efficient AI deployment, ensuring systems meet mission-critical…
